not <S%G3943>addicted<s%> to <S%G3943>wine<s%> <S%G3361>or<s%> <S%G4131>pugnacious,<s%> but <S%G1933>gentle,<s%> <S%G269>uncontentious,<s%> <S%G866>free<s%> from the <S%G866>love<s%> of <S%G866>money.<s%>

[He must be] one who <S%G4291>manages<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>household<s%> <S%G2573>well,<s%> <S%G2192>keeping<s%> his <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1722>under<s%> <S%G5292>control<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4587>dignity<s%>

(but <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> does not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3609>how<s%> to <S%G4291>manage<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>household,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> will he <S%G1959>take<s%> <S%G1959>care<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?);

And he <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3141>reputation<s%> with <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G1855>outside<s%> [the church,] <S%G2443>so<s%> that he may not <S%G1706>fall<s%> into <S%G3680>reproach<s%> and the <S%G3803>snare<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

<S%G1249>Deacons<s%> <S%G5615>likewise<s%> [must be] <S%G4586>men<s%> of <S%G4586>dignity,<s%> not double-tongued, <S%G3361>or<s%> <S%G4337>addicted<s%> to <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G3361>or<s%> <S%G146>fond<s%> of <S%G146>sordid<s%> <S%G146>gain,<s%>

And let <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> be <S%G1381>tested;<s%> <S%G1534>then<s%> let them <S%G1247>serve<s%> as <S%G1247>deacons<s%> if they are <S%G410>beyond<s%> <S%G410>reproach.<s%>

Let <S%G1249>deacons<s%> be <S%G435>husbands<s%> of [only] <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> [and] <S%G2573>good<s%> <S%G4291>managers<s%> of [their] <S%G5043>children<s%> and their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>households.<s%>

For <S%G3588>those<s%> who have <S%G1247>served<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> as <S%G1247>deacons<s%> <S%G4046>obtain<s%> for <S%G1438>themselves<s%> a <S%G2570>high<s%> <S%G898>standing<s%> and <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3954>confidence<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith<s%> that is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
I am <S%G1125>writing<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> to you, <S%G1679>hoping<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G5035>before<s%> <S%G5035>long;<s%>

but in <S%G1437>case<s%> I <S%G1019>am<s%> <S%G1019>delayed,<s%> [I write] <S%G2443>so<s%> that you may <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> one <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G390>conduct<s%> himself in the <S%G3624>household<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G4769>pillar<s%> and <S%G1477>support<s%> of the <S%G225>truth.<s%>
